metadata.name: Zaha Hadid - Heydar Aliyev Centre (Pre-Metaverse)
metadata.description:
The Heydar Aliyev Centre was built in 2012 in Baku, Azerbaijan by the talented Iraqi-British female architect Zaha Hadid. Zaha Hadid was renowned for her distinctive curved style and organic architectural forms. Space of various sizes formed organically with the architectâ€™s unique language were created to host exhibitions, forums, conferences and concerts.

This piece of work remained one of the most iconic work by Zaha Hadid until she passed away in 2016.
